column1: Little Goat Diner////I was frankly underwhelmed by Little Goat. The beer list was pretty run of the mill
column2: the burgers we got were fine but way too expensive for the quality
column3: the space needs better sound absorption because it is *extremely* loud
column4: and the service was so-so. There's a lot of hype about this place
column5: but it seems like it lacks substance.
